Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (80.95%) toArenicin-3R: 24%, C: 19%, V=G=N: 10%.Activity: active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 0.125 ug/ml) and K. pneumoniae BAA-2146 NDM-1 (MIC 2 ug/ml). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
Literature Information.Author: Elliott AG, Huang JX, Neve S, Zuegg J, Edwards IA, Cain AK, Boinett CJ, Barquist L, Lundberg CV, Steen J, Butler MS, Mobli M, Porter KM, Blaskovich MAT, Lociuro S, Strandh M, Cooper MA.2020
Literature Information.Title: An amphipathic peptide with antibiotic activity against multidrug-resistant Gram-negative bacteria.
